author: dug
msg: Added options get/set methods on handler
Added a GetQuoteClient which will actually get IBM's stock quote
- assumes you have the soap samples in your classpath (for now)
Added some dummy RPCBody/RPCArg stuff just to do some basic XML
RPCDispatcher is hard coded to the stockquote demo but I'll fix that
after deploying the deploy.xml file in samples/xml

author: dug
msg: Adding some very very basic SOAPEnv processing stuff just until we settle
on what the right stuff is.  This will at least parse everything into
headers and body.  The EchoHandler will now make use of this instead of
blindly taking the input message as the output one.

author: rubys
msg: Change product name in the licenses
